rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"This runbook is designed to check the basic parameters of the device interfaces."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"1. Checking the peer interfaces to see if there is any duplex/speed mismatch."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"2. Highlighting the MTU value of the interface."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"3. Checking the peer interfaces to see if there is any port mode mismatch."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"4. Highlighting the allowed VLAN numbers at the location of a trunking port."},{"insert":"

"}]}
rb_notes.text:
This runbook is designed to check the basic parameters of the device interfaces.

1. Checking the peer interfaces to see if there is any duplex/speed mismatch.
2. Highlighting the MTU value of the interface.
3. Checking the peer interfaces to see if there is any port mode mismatch.
4. Highlighting the allowed VLAN numbers at the location of a trunking port.

1. Checking the peer interfaces to see if there is any duplex/speed mismatch.
